name: pyloto-corp
description: Pyloto Corp - Plataforma de intermediação de entregas com IA

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:website" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:website && npm run build:admin
scripts.cf:preview:website: cd apps/website && npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages@latest && npx wrangler pages dev .vercel/output/static
scripts.cf:deploy:website: cd apps/website && npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages@latest && npx wrangler pages deploy .vercel/output/static --branch=main
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend

author: Pyloto Corp
